items.question: How to get customer support?
items.answer: You can contact our customer service staff via WhatsApp, IG or in the group. We will respond to general inquiries within 2 hours and emergency support within 24 hours.

items.question: How to check the express delivery itinerary?
items.answer: Copy the tracking number provided in the order, and then visit 'https://www.17track.net/zh-cn' to check.
